description: Send commits to a pastebin site using pastebinit. Part of git-extras. More information: https://github.com/tj/git-extras/blob/master/Commands.md#git-paste.

useCases.description: Send the patches between the current branch and its upstream to a pastebin using pastebinit:
Pass options to git format-patch in order to select a different set of commits (@^ selects the parent of HEAD, and so the currently checked out commit is sent):
